plot: A former "strongman" (a power sports athlete) who has become an actor turns his cellar into a home cinema. To get the physical roles he wants, he trains hard and stops at nothing to test ...
title: Perspective du sous-sol
plot_es: A former "strongman" (a power sports athlete) who has become an actor turns his cellar into a home cinema. To get the physical roles he wants, he trains hard and stops at nothing to test ...
